lectures.tracktitle: Keynote from Sindhu Gangadharan MD, SAP Labs India | Head, Customer Innovation Services, SAP | and Fireside chat with customers and partners

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Transforming Business AI with Data and AI Agents
sessionsBySequence.description: Transforming Business AI with Data and AI Agents

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Revolutionize ABAP Development with Joule
sessionsBySequence.description: Session showcases the AI capabilities in ABAP and how to leverage them to boost developer productivity

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Gen AI solution that won hearts in SAP Hack2Build 2024
sessionsBySequence.description: In this session will cover two applications 1] IBM Intelligent Clinical Trial Patient Engagement App: Focused on life sciences clients, this Gen AI powered application can transforms user experiences for clinical trial participants 2. IBM Intelligent Fraud Detection in Medical Grant Payments : IBM’s Gen AI-powered Fraud Detection solution revolutionizes grant management, safeguarding pharmaceutical enterprises from financial and reputational risks.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Discover accelerated journal entry creation process with AI-Assisted Intelligent Journal Upload Cases (IJU)
sessionsBySequence.description: Accelerate Period-end Journal Entries with SAP Business AI for Finance. Discover how SAP Business AI for Finance and SAP S/4HANA Cloud deliver capabilities that accelerate the creation and upload of period-end manual journal entries, generally created for accruals, deferrals, provisions, etc. Period-end journal entries are necessary for a period-closing activity. Finance teams spend considerable time curating data as per the policies and reporting needs.  a staple for finance teams. What if these repetitive tasks are made effortlessly by AI aids? SAP Business AI for Finance offers cutting edge solutions that Imagine a solution that streamline operations and automate processes. Generate period-end entries that are aligned with posting policies faster than ever. AI assists in handling large data volumes, applying posting policies, and other related guidelines, and preparing proposals for user reviews. A user can post journal entries after a successful review.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Maximize Business Intelligence with Next-Gen AI: AWS and SAP Implementation Strategies
sessionsBySequence.description: Explore how SAP customers can harness Amazon Web Services (AWS) generative AI capabilities to innovate, increase productivity, gain insights, generate code, and foster creativity across their enterprise. This session outlines how various teams—finance, manufacturing, sales, legal, and development—can utilize Amazon Bedrock and Amazon Q alongside SAP data to revolutionize business operations. Additionally, it highlights new options for accessing Amazon Bedrock models within SAP’s generative AI hub and provides insights from SAP customers already leveraging these capabilities.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Architecting Generative AI solutions with SAP BTP and Open Source tools
sessionsBySequence.description: Explore the architecture for building custom generative AI applications for your SAP landscape using SAP BTP and open source tools. In this session, you'll see a live demonstration with a NodeJS-based SAP CAP application that illustrates how to integrate SAP’s robust cloud services with flexible open source frameworks. Learn key design patterns, strategies, and the emerging role of intelligent agents in streamlining workflows and enhancing decision-making for scalable, secure GenAI solutions.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Learn ABAP Cloud and Joule's AI based ABAP developer capabilities
sessionsBySequence.description: Learn About ABAP Cloud Landing Page in ADT is the solution. The ABAP Cloud Landing Page serves as a comprehensive gateway that caters to developers across all proficiency levels - from newcomers to seasoned ABAP experts. This centralized platform offers a meticulously organized collection of SAP-validated, trusted, repository, resources, making it effortless to navigate through essential information. The page features distinct sections including Get Started, ABAP Cloud wizards for each Development Scenarios,documentation links, Roadmaps, What's New Information, available tutorials, ensuring a smooth learning journey.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Customer landscape insights using Maintenance Planner
sessionsBySequence.description: Get transparency on a customer’s technical system landscape using ‘Maintenance Planner’. Learn how we visualize technical system landscapes and also how these features like notes recommendation, comparison of technical systems enables SAP IT administrators get a better view about their system landscapes.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Developing AI Patterns using CAP (nodejs) in BTP
sessionsBySequence.description: With SAP AI Core and its consolidated foundation models offered to customer under one roof, embedding intelligence into side-by-side apps on BTP is made easy. In this session we will discuss about one implementation of Similarity Search pattern. And we will deep dive on implementation of patterns Similarity Search and RAG using CAP LLM plugin and SAP HANA cloud vector engine

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Developing Intelligent Apps using SAP Business AI
sessionsBySequence.description: Learn how to build AI applications using SAP Business AI in SAP BTP with real-world use cases and demos

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Integrating and Operating Generative AI Capabilities in SAP S/4HANA with ISLM
sessionsBySequence.description: Are you looking to equip yourself to harness the power of AI and generative AI? Join us to explore the capabilities of Intelligent Scenario Lifecycle Management (ISLM), a powerful framework that seamlessly integrates AI into business applications. Learn to build custom AI use cases with minimal coding, leveraging Generative AI Hub for LLM access. Discover how ISLM simplifies the deployment of pre-delivered AI capabilities in SAP S/4HANA, offering turnkey solutions and lifecycle management to enhance business applications efficiently.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Generative AI Capabilities in SAP Integration Suite and Business use cases & LIVE Demos
sessionsBySequence.description: SAP Integration Suite leverages Generative AI (Gen AI) to automate integration workflows and optimize business processes. Key features include AI-based generation of integration flows, Groovy script optimization, and API anomaly detection. These tools help developers streamline workflows, enhance code efficiency, and proactively monitor API performance in real-time. By reducing manual effort and improving system reliability, SAP Integration Suite enables businesses to achieve higher productivity and operational efficiency.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Integrate & Operate GenAI Capabilities with Intelligent Scenario Lifecycle Management
sessionsBySequence.description: Intelligent Scenario Lifecycle Management (ISLM) is fully integrated into SAP S/4HANA, enabling the efficient integration and management of both custom and prebuilt AI use cases with minimal coding and turnkey auto activation. Integrated with ABAP AI SDK, ISLM now extends its capabilities to include generative AI through the SAP Generative AI Hub. The latest functionality is available across all SAP S/4HANA editions and the SAP BTP ABAP Environment, including support for lower releases.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Paving your way for efficient application development on BTP
sessionsBySequence.description: Guided path for Application Development on SAP BTP:Understand the framework for application development, which includes consolidated BTP tools, services, recommendations, best practices, and a robust architectural framework.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Transforming CX with SAP C/4HANA: Powered by BTP & AI
sessionsBySequence.description: Join this live demo to see how SAP BTP and the CX AI Toolkit power a seamless, 360-degree customer experience by integrating SAP CDC, CDP, Emarsys, Commerce, CPQ, and Sales & Service Cloud. This session is ideal for those looking to understand SAP CX portfolio.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Integration of solutions made easy with Cloud Integration Automation Service
sessionsBySequence.description: The integration of hybrid cloud scenarios is currently a complex and error-prone manual process, demanding expert knowledge.SAP's Cloud Integration Automation Service offers a simpler method for semi-automatically setting up standardized integration configuration.By leveraging role-based workflows and making use of available system landscape information, customers are led through the integration process.This minimizes the need for manual input, significantly reducing potential errors and the associated support costs.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Business Data Cloud Overview
sessionsBySequence.description: Get to know an overview of SAP's latest offering SAP Business Data Cloud Overview

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Deploy SaaS Applications to SAP BTP, Kyma runtime using CAP Operator
sessionsBySequence.description: CAP Operator helps deploy and manage the lifecycle of multi-tenant SAP Cloud Application Programming Model applications and related components, based on SAP BTP golden path, within a Kubernetes cluster. Link to CAP documentation section: https://cap.cloud.sap/docs/plugins/#cap-operator-plugin

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Next-Gen Enterprise Search:  SAP Fiori meets Joule
sessionsBySequence.description: With SAP Fiori Enterprise Search, customers have long been able to search their business objects effectively.But now, we're taking it a step further. By integrating SAP Fiori with SAP Joule, we are introducing the power of natural language processing to business searches. Join us to learn how combining SAP Fiori’s robust enterprise search capabilities with SAP Joule’s intelligent natural language processing transforms the way businesses access and interact with their data.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Joule powered Skills Management in HCM People Analytics
sessionsBySequence.description: Attend this session to understand about how skills insights can be derived easily and seamlessly with the help SAP Joule. HCM People Analytics brings together SAP Datasphere, SAP Analytics Cloud and SAP Joule on top of HCM Skills Data to help manage skills and proficiency related insights for natural language queries.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Resolving Business Issues with AI-assisted Situation Handling
sessionsBySequence.description: Critical business issues demand swift and effective solutions. Situation Handling in SAP S/4HANA Cloud combines automatic situation detection, user notifications, and AI-driven recommendations to empower business experts with actionable insights. Learn how process owners can customize prompts and integrate AI into every situation use case with AI-assisted Situation Handling. Join us to explore the key features of Situation Handling and get an exclusive look at our vision for AI-powered intelligence in situation resolution.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Leverage the ABAP GenAI SDK to build intelligent applications
sessionsBySequence.description: Session showcases the use of the ABAP AI SDK which handles communication with the SAP AI Core, ISLM to empower ABAP developers to build intelligent applications

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Business Data Validation using Data Transition Validation Tool
sessionsBySequence.description: The data transition validation is a tool that allows you to compare business data before and after a system conversion from SAP ECC to SAP S/4HANA. Currently, the scope of the tool is to support validation of system conversion transition scenario with pre-delivered content and custom reports for business validation.
sessionsBySequence.organization1: Software Logistics, Cloud & Lifecycle Management, SAP Labs India

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Using Generative AI in Goal Management - SAP SuccessFactors
sessionsBySequence.description: Users can use the Assisted Performance Goals feature to create goals using Generative AI. The Assisted Writing with Text Analyzer AI feature can be used to get assistance from AI technology to enhance the content from text and text area fields, like Goal Name, Metric or Description

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAC Seamless Planning
sessionsBySequence.description: Close integration of SAP Analytics Cloud and SAP Datasphere for planning use cases, with the ability to save planning model data directly in SAP Datasphere.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Enterprise GenAI Blueprint
sessionsBySequence.description: SAP-Specific Success Stories - Manufacturing: Predictive maintenance with SAP AI Core- Finance: Intelligent document processing with BTP- Supply Chain: Demand forecasting with SAP AI- HR: Talent analytics with SuccessFactors and AI

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Empowering Partners: Extending Golden Path SAP BTP CAP Application
sessionsBySequence.description: This session explores how SAP BTP CAP applications enable extensibility for Golden Path SaaS solutions. When configured for extensibility, CAP-based applications allow customers to tailor solutions to their unique business needs. As an SAP Partner, you have the capability to extend the base application to create tenant-specific customizations, ensuring seamless alignment with customer requirements. Step-by-step tutorials guide partners in extending, deploying, and running multitenant extensions.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: End-to-End AI-Powered Sales & Service: Cloud V2 to S/4HANA Order Processing & FSM Technician Management
sessionsBySequence.description: Imagine a customer, John, who recently purchased the  Multi Eco 11i  product. One day, he encounters an issue and needs assistance. What happens next? Let’s walk through John’s journey—from raising a case to resolution—while ensuring an excellent customer experience through seamless automation and smart recommendations.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Unleashing the power of Retrieval Augmented Generation with SAP AI Core Generative AI Hub and SAP HANA Cloud Vector Engine
sessionsBySequence.description: Join us at this interactive demo pod to explore how Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) can revolutionise enterprise AI applications using SAP AI Core's Generative AI Hub and SAP HANA Cloud Vector Engine.In this demo session, you will witness how RAG enhances large language models (LLMs) by integrating real-time, enterprise-specific data, leading to more accurate and context-aware AI responses. We will demonstrate:Semantic Search in Action – See how the SAP HANA Cloud Vector Engine enables intelligent data retrieval using vector embeddings.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Shift-Left Approach to Business Data Preparation for Quality with JOULE
sessionsBySequence.description: To improve end to end business data scenario testing, diverse and realistic transaction data is essential. Existing solutions often fall short in mimicking complex, real customer like business data, leading to overlooked issues. The proposed solution leverages AI with RAG and offers a feature to generate transaction data with varied master data and organisation data simulating customer data enabling wide range of real world scenarios. This ensures more effective testing, better system validation, and more accurate replication of real-world conditions in testing environments.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Notes Recommendation in Maintenance Planner
sessionsBySequence.description: Wondering how customers discover SAP notes applicable for their systems to keep their landscapes secure? Look at the latest features in the Notes Recommendation application within maintenance planner.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: AI Log Analyzer and Problem Solver
sessionsBySequence.description: Golden Path initiative from SAP is a big step forward in simplifying the development and integration of business applications on BTP. However, there are still many loosely coupled components during runtime often require expert knowledge to detect and solve root cause of problem. With AI Log Analyser we address this time-consuming task of diagnosing and fixing runtime error situations by offering an AI assistant to SAP and partner engineers to reduce time spent in error analysis, thereby reducing TCD.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Joule Studio & AI capabilities Demo
sessionsBySequence.description: In this demo, you can see the Generative AI capabilities in SAP Build along with how Joule Studio fits into SAP Build family and also how AI Agents can be developed in Joule Studio

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Build Extensibility Wizard for SAP S/4HANA Cloud
sessionsBySequence.description: In this session, we will show how SAP Build helps with the most common extension needs in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Systems including On Stack Vs Side by Side. When to use what option and a demo flow for the latest Extensibility Wizard capabilities.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Business Data Cloud Demo
sessionsBySequence.description: Demo of SAP Business Data Cloud & Insight App

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP BW Modernization in Business Data Cloud
sessionsBySequence.description: For existing BW customers, sometimes it’s really challenging to replace their SAP BW 7.5 and SAP BW/4HANA environment with BW bridge & SAP Datasphere Core which ends migration with time consuming and expensive.Historically grown SAP BW systems need to be managed, demands high maintenance. To keep their investments made in SAP BW and address existing challenges with Innovation Deficits, we are now evolving from a business data fabric architecture into the Business Data Cloud where we make the BW journey for existing customers even simpler than before. By lifting SAP BW to the cloud (PCE), customers are enabled to leverage BW data as a data product, while taking advantage of a holistically SAP-managed environment, lowering TCO for customers.We can implement new use cases using BW data products which are directly accessible via object store of SAP Datasphere and leverage semantic onboarding for further transformation.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Data Privacy Integration - Unified Data Privacy offering on BTP
sessionsBySequence.description: Manage everything privacy through the SAP Data Privacy Integration Service. The service offers all key data privacy capabilities and enables customers to manage all business applications through different privacy and compliance regulations including those with AI use cases

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: CAP Extension using Joule
sessionsBySequence.description: Extending SaaS apps on BTP often requires CAP/CDS expertise, creating a barrier for users without deep technical knowledge. Our Extension Companion simplifies this process with AI-driven no-code to pro-code transformation. Users describe their business needs, and the tool generates complex extensions automatically, removing the technical burden. This demo showcases how technology bridges the gap, enabling seamless app extensions and unlocking new possibilities with simplicity and efficiency.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: IT-ITeS SSC nasscom
sessionsBySequence.description: NASSCOM's Talent Connect portal: A revolutionary portal that bridges the gap between businesses scouting for digitally skilled candidates and certified talent aspiring to level up their careers. Get the access to 150+ industries, 1.4 lac+ opportunities, PAN India.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Develop RAP Fiori App using CDS Custom Entity with dynamic navigation in SAP BTP
sessionsBySequence.description: Develop an E2E custom UI app addressing intricate business scenarios in SAP BTP, with-Dynamic management of facets for enhanced user navigation and experience-Dynamic entity navigation for seamless data exploration across related entities-Cross LoB integration for real-time monitoring of Digital Access Licenses in SAP BTP-Front runner in extending metadata for custom entities-Transform a freestyle UI5 app into a Fiori Elements List Report-Leverage Data Point UI annotations to enhance UI and data visualization

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Business Technology Platform Booth - Business AI with BTP
sessionsBySequence.description: With the advent of Business AI as our core focus strategy for 2025, we walk you through all the possibilities to enhance your enterprise with AI. Meet the experts and learn more about Business AI and BTP

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Monitoring End to End Master Data Replications in SAP Cloud ALM
sessionsBySequence.description: Customers expect a proper end to end monitoring of data replication flows between different integrated SAP solutions. With the new object centric UI, we have provided a better monitoring solution for different integrated scenarios. This new object centric UI provides SAP customers with a consistent easy to use cross-solution monitoring to ensure complete end-to-end visibility of key business scenarios and guarantee smooth day-to-day business operations. This facilitates E2E Monitoring for customers that includes capabilities like central monitoring dashboards and embedded alerting.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Business AI commercial model
sessionsBySequence.description: The session aims to provide an overview of the

, covering key aspects such as selling Business AI and the associated incentive programs. Understanding this model is crucial before initiating any SAP Business AI project, as it equips end users to make informed decisions.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Notifications and Process Variants in SAP Build Process Automation
sessionsBySequence.description: In this demo session, learn how to create custom Notifications in SAP Build Process Automation and the concept of Process Variants

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Joule in action with SAP Build WorkZone
sessionsBySequence.description: Joule in Action: Integrating Joule with S/4 and SuccessFactors with SAP Build WorkZone as central entry point

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Showcasing GenAI hub grounding capabilities
sessionsBySequence.description: This demo pod covers end-to-end process of Grounding in GenAIHub, focusing on its integration through the orchestration service and grounding pipeline creation to create vectors chunks using AI Launchpad.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Container Security for AI Workloads: Challenges and Solutions
sessionsBySequence.description: As AI workloads power modern applications, containerization is key to scalable deployments but brings unique security challenges like image vulnerabilities, runtime threats, and compliance risks. This talk and demo address securing containerized AI environments using tools like Kyverno, Falco & Diki for policy, threat and compliance management. Learn actionable strategies to protect AI pipelines while maintaining performance.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Business Process Transformation using SAP Signavio Process Insights
sessionsBySequence.description: SAP Signavio Process Insights enables companies to accelerate their transformation journey by providing data-driven insights into process inefficiencies, bottlenecks, and improvement opportunities. By leveraging real-time analytics, recommendations, and benchmarking capabilities, businesses can identify quick wins and long-term optimization strategies. SAP Signavio integrates seamlessly with existing enterprise systems, allowing organizations to model, simulate, and implement process improvements with minimal disruption.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Build Code and SAP Joule - Generating an Application, Search Code Repository and Search SAP Help portal
sessionsBySequence.description: SAP Build Code and SAP Joule - Generating an Application, Search Code Repository and Search SAP Help portal

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: IT-ITeS SSC nasscom
sessionsBySequence.description: NASSCOM's Talent Connect portal: A revolutionary portal that bridges the gap between businesses scouting for digitally skilled candidates and certified talent aspiring to level up their careers. Get the access to 150+ industries, 1.4 lac+ opportunities, PAN India.

handson.sessiontitle: Simplifying App Development with SAP Build Code and Joule AI
handson.description: This session demonstrates the capabilities of SAP Build Code, enhanced by Joule, a generative AI-powered coding assistant designed to streamline application development. SAP Build Code provides an integrated environment for coding, testing, integrations, and lifecycle management.

handson.sessiontitle: Optimizing SAP BTP Infrastructure Management with Terraform Exporter
handson.description: Take a hands-on approach to managing SAP BTP infrastructure with Terraform! In this interactive session, you'll explore the Terraform Exporteróa powerful CLI tool that simplifies and streamlines the brownfield adoption of Infrastructure as Code. Through guided exercises, you'll learn how to quickly export existing SAP BTP resources into Terraform configurations, reducing complexity and improving management efficiency

handson.sessiontitle: SAP HANA Cloud with Vector Engine and GenAI Hub
handson.description: In this use case, we will embark on a journey to explore the capabilities of SAP HANA Cloud vector engine, SAP Generative AI Hub and the Python Langchain Framework. The goal is to equip you with the knowledge and skills to handle unstructured and semi-structured data and build efficient applications.

handson.sessiontitle: Fusion development with ABAP Cloud in SAP Build
handson.description: Learn how to access & use ABAP Cloud from SAP Build and use fusion development for Clean Core

handson.sessiontitle: SAP HANA Cloud with Vector Engine and GenAI Hub
handson.description: In this use case, we will embark on a journey to explore the capabilities of SAP HANA Cloud vector engine, SAP Generative AI Hub and the Python Langchain Framework. The goal is to equip you with the knowledge and skills to handle unstructured and semi-structured data and build efficient applications.

handson.sessiontitle: Streamlined Document Management for Fiori CAP Applications
handson.description: Effective application development is crucial for streamlined business operations. Discover how our ready-to-use SAP Document Management CAP Plugin, in alignment with the Golden Path, can transform your Fiori CAP application in just a few minutes.

handson.sessiontitle: SAP Build PA Process Variants, Notifications
handson.description: SAP Build PA Process Variants, Notifications
